titleStmt.title: Divine meditations. Written by an honourable person. Whereto is adjoyned, a determination of the question, whether men ought to kneele at the receipt of the Holy Communion. And an essay of friendship
titleStmt.author: Wake, Isaac, Sir, 1580?-1632.

titleStmt.title: Divine meditations. Written by an honourable person. Whereto is adjoyned, a determination of the question, whether men ought to kneele at the receipt of the Holy Communion. And an essay of friendship
titleStmt.author: Wake, Isaac, Sir, 1580?-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T. Badger, for Humphrey Mosley, and are to be sold at his shop at his shop at the Princes Armes, in S. Pauls Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: An honourable person = Sir Isaac Wake.
With a final imprimatur leaf: Imprimatur. Tho. Wykes. R.P. Episc. Lond. Capell: Domest.
"An essay of friendship." has a separate title page dated 1640; register and pagination continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
